About Me

Hello!


My name is Chad and I'm a front end web developer who enjoys creating and building websites and applications. I'm experienced in making hand-coded websites from scratch and with React, and I'm always learning new tools and technologies. I'm passionate about learning and value growing and callaborating with other people to create awesome, great-looking projects.
